entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
